player-modal.title: Add a player
player-modal.subtitle: To add a player to the database, please fill in the following fields.
player-modal.ig_username_error: Please fill in the IG username
player-modal.discord_error: Please fill in the Discord username
player-modal.discord_bad_format: Please enter a valid Discord nickname (ex: John#1234)
player-modal.main_bis_class_info: Indicate whether this is the player's primary or secondary class
player-modal.first_weapon_error: Please fill in the first weapon
player-modal.second_weapon_error: Please fill in the second weapon
player-modal.guild_placeholder: Type the first characters of the guild name

guild-modal.title: Add a guild
guild-modal.subtitle: To add a guild to the database, please fill in the following fields.
guild-modal.guild_name_error: Please fill in the guild name
guild-modal.faction_error: Please fill in the guild faction
